description: nova boot instance from volume not support specify the volume_type when cinder-volume was configured with multiple storage
title: nova boot instance from volume not support specify the volume_type

comments.content: nova boot instance from volume not support specify the volume_type when cinder-volume was configured with multiple storage
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~kongxiangyun

comments.content:
This is not a bug, this is a wishlist item for a feature, which has come up several times over the years. See this mailing list discussion for some background:

http://lists.openstack.org/pipermail/openstack-dev/2017-May/117242.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem
